**As a** [role]
**I need a** [function]
**So that** [benefit]

### Details and Assumptions 
   * [document what you know]

### Acceptance Criteria 
      
      gherkin 

  Given [some context]
  When [certain action is context]
  Then [the outcome of action is observed]
